coreAttributes.name: condom-webbing
coreAttributes.description: This thick binding of spider-webbing is acting like a condom, and will prevent any semen from entering the body of a sexual partner.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly wrap [npc.her] [npc.penis] in a thick binding of spider-webbing.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly wrap [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis] in a thick binding of spider-webbing.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to roughly wrap [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis] in a thick binding of spider-webbing.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was binding [npc.her] [npc.penis] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was binding [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was binding [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
